author: Guo Rui | South China Morning Post and Echo Xie | South China Morning Post
title: Chinese county goes into coronavirus lockdown amid fear of second wave
description: Authorities order residents of Jia county to stay home after reports of cases linked to the area’s hospital.
content:
Special approval was required for all movement outside the home, it said.
After months of restrictions to contain the spread of the coronavirus, China has reported a decline in domestic cases of Covid-19, the disease caused by the virus. On Wednesday, the Na… [+1827 chars]
